vulnerability.name: USN-7013-1
vulnerability.description: It was discovered that Dovecot incorrectly handled a large number of address headers. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Dovecot to consume resources, leading to a denial of service. (CVE-2024-23184)  It was discovered that Dovecot incorrectly handled very large headers. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Dovecot to consume resources, leading to a denial of service. (CVE-2024-23185)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in Dovecot.
